message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this fantastic product for $10,000. It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll be very happy with it.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I understand you're on a budget, but $8,000 simply doesn't reflect the value of this product. I'm willing to come down to $9,000. This is a fair compromise, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $8,500. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
